name: Deck Helmet
tag_list: deck-helmet, deck-helmet-review, deck-restoration, deck-cleaning, deck-refinishing, decks-maryland, decks-virginia
overview:
Deck Helmet Revolutionary Deck Resurfacing System transforms your old worn out deck to a beautiful low maintenance composite deck at a fraction of the cost of deck replacement. Deck Helmets Patent Pending System eliminates yearly maintenance and permanently protects your deck for 10 Years . Additionally our system eliminates rotting, cracking, warping, and splitting making your deck safe for your family and friends! The Helmet does not stain or splinter and provides a mildew resistant finish that can easily be cleaned with just soap and water.

Customer service is a top priority our 12 step process and job completion system guarantees a smooth transition from your old to new deck. We are Rated # 1 by Leading Consumer magazine and are proud members of the BBB!! Our methods environmentally friendly and save thousands of trees and preserve natural resources.

Newly resurfaced decks increase the value of your home and prepare them to sell at a premium price in the future. Deck Helmet offers a variety of options including Fence Helmet, Patio Helmet , Patio Helmet and even Composite Helmet . Deck Helmet can be completed in a fraction of the time and inconvenience of a rebuild and most installations can be done in 1 DAY! So restore your deck today and start enjoying your new extended living room with your family and friends.

video_embeds.description: Glimpse of the services we offer @ DeckHelmet. Please visit our webpage at www.deckhelmet.com
